channel.title: Easy problem?
channel.description:
So, i got my server to work and i decided i wanted to try a different source instead of Phonescape/TestScape
So the new one i downloaded (Boxingscape) When i compile it, it does this. [img]http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3628/5792371438_07bc8b5f67_b.jpg[/img] and then when i try to run the server, it comes up with this. [img]http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3056/5791812975_be3b9a8fa7_b.jpg[/img] If i use the "Run.exe" i can get passed it to the login screen, but it won't let me login (even if i use localhost)
It's probably something extremely simple, but i've been trying for hours and i thought i'd ask...

item.title: Easy problem?
item.dc:creator: @Collin2234 Collin2234
item.description:
@Collin2234 wrote:

First make sure you are portfowarded and your no-ip is running, Then go into your client go to gui.java and search “server” and you should see server ip “something” change the “something” to your no-ip. It will prob be “127.0.0.1” Change that to your no-ip compile add to archive then send to whoever…

but… If it is set to the no ip you can’t connect so after you send it go back to gui.java and change it back to 127.0.0.1 then everyone will be connnected

Read full topic

I think it has something to do with my IP address, i’m not sure if it’s in the server or w/e i made a no-ip account (the ip is mitchscapez.no-ip.biz) but idk where to put that so it will let others connect to that IP address instead of the one in the client

again, idk if any of that made sense im trying the best i can lol[/quote]
